oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparison of Bacteria Populations within Clean and Recycled Sand used for Bedding in Dairy Facilities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kristula, M. A.
Rogers, W.
Hogan, J. S.
Sabo, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bedding
cow comfort
udder health
mechanical sand separator
gravity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sand is widely considered the best bedding for cow comfort and udder health. Advances in manure handling technology has enabled sand to be separated from manure by either active (mechanical sand separator) or passive (gravity) means. The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety of recycled sand as a bedding material for dairy cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2005; 185-186
